org.jetel.data

Class Defaults.Record

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.data.Defaults.Record
  • Enclosing class:
    Defaults

    public static final class Defaults.Record
extends java.lang.Object
    Defaults regarding DataRecord structure/manipulation

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_COMPRESSION_LEVEL

    • Field Detail

      • RECORD_INITIAL_SIZE

        public static int RECORD_INITIAL_SIZE
        Should be used as initial size of CloverBuffer dedicated to handle a data record. Determines expected upper bounds of record size (serialized) in bytes.
        Clover engine is able to handle even bigger records. Underlying buffer may be re-allocated in the case a bigger record appears.

      • RECORD_LIMIT_SIZE

        public static int RECORD_LIMIT_SIZE
        Determines maximum size of record (serialized) in bytes.
        If you are getting BufferOverflow, increase the limit here.

      • MAX_RECORD_SIZE

        @Deprecated
public static int MAX_RECORD_SIZE
        Deprecated. use RECORD_INITIAL_SIZE or RECORD_LIMIT_SIZE instead
        Obsolete constant, which was substituted by logicaly same constant RECORD_LIMIT_SIZE. In case this is used as buffer size of a ByteBuffer (container for serialized form of a data record) RECORD_INITIAL_SIZE should be used.

      • FIELD_INITIAL_SIZE

        public static int FIELD_INITIAL_SIZE
        Should be used as initial size of CloverBuffer dedicated to handle a data field. Determines expected upper bounds of field size (serialized) in bytes.
        Clover engine is able to handle even bigger fields. Underlying buffer may be re-allocated in the case a bigger field appears.

      • FIELD_LIMIT_SIZE

        public static int FIELD_LIMIT_SIZE
        Determines maximum size of single field (serialized) in bytes.
        If you are getting BufferOverflow, increase the limit here.

      • DEFAULT_COMPRESSION_LEVEL

        public static int DEFAULT_COMPRESSION_LEVEL
        Compression level for compressed data fields (CompressedByteField - cbyte). Should be set to a value from interval 0-9.

      • RECORDS_BUFFER_SIZE

        public static int RECORDS_BUFFER_SIZE
        Size of internal buffer for temporary storing several data records. Size should be at least RECORD_INITIAL_SIZE, better several times bigger
